channel.title: Avatar 317 - VPS Hosted
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Website[/size] www.avatarps.team-talk.net
[size=18pt]Forums [/size] www.avatarps.team-talk.net/forum
[size=18pt]Download[/size] https://www.dropbox.com/s/cmctb90k1ea1k56/Avatar.jar
Avatar is a unique 317 based, It is a 317 with higher revisions and map. There are many features such as, unique training, unique skilling areas, Voting and PvM Reward Systems. We offer 25 working skills, Minigame, Amazing Shops, Completionist Cape, Free to Play!
[size=18pt]Some Features of our server:[/size] - 24/7 Uptime No Lag - Team Dungeoneering - Duo Slayer - Daily Updates - Full Summoning - Hosted Dedicated Servers - Complete Clan Chat [Ranks, Loot Share] - Full Screen - All 25 Skills - Kiln Minigame - Customizeable Client - Falador Party Room - Dicing - Flower Poker - Loyalty Titles - Perfect Pking System - Perfect Switching - Curses - Prestige - Prestige Shop - Squeal of Fortune - Pest Control

item.title: Avatar 317 - VPS Hosted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:22, topic:545110”][quote author=Death Style link=topic=663991.msg4438787#msg4438787 date=1405880937]
is there some secret way they have of checking it’s actually IPB and not some custom software masquerading as it
[/quote]
There must be some kind of weekly callback, I’ve never really checked though. I’ve always just kept to the free software. IPB is sluggish and 80% of the features are useless, vBulletin code is about as good as a trap door in a canoe. At least with the free softwares you know what you’re getting.[/quote]
Wouldn’t surprise me if there were more than one script. That’d be what would make it hard to actually crack. Because removing only one script wouldn’t be enough, there’d be other ones.
And then they could make somethings depend on the scripts, so you’d have to have the correct data in them. So on, so forth.
Anyways, yes, I’m very certain that IPB trys to get any hacked/cracked/stolen copy off the internet as soon as they can, but that doesn’t solve their issue, obviously.

Read full topic

actually knowing i have illegal content already is the reason i wouldn’t pay since it will inevitably be shut down

item.title: Avatar 317 - VPS Hosted
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Death Style:

now i know IPB is bloated but really, SMF > IPB???

IPB is bloated, sluggish and incredibly overpriced. For the forum software and all the add-ons you could be paying well over the $1000 mark. Using something like SMF or MyBB, that’s a whole lot more money to spend on your server. It’s more about the surrounding circumstances than what is better. SMF and MyBB anything can be achieved or found for free, other softwares money is predominant in most situations.

Even if a server was to have a startup of $2000 (which is highly unheard of) spending half of that right away is completely ridiculous. You could get an incredibly good and customised version of SMF/MyBB for, at the most, $200. That’s a custom theme, custom add-ons, custom everything to your server. It’s an incredible saving.

Read full topic

item.title: Avatar 317 - VPS Hosted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Death Style:

now i know IPB is bloated but really, SMF > IPB???

I was saying, don’t waste your money on IPB.
I did not say SMF was better. It is, however, better than what he currently has. Whatever that may be. Hence why I said to just get that instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Avatar 317 - VPS Hosted
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:12, topic:545110”]I banned https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=692611 and removed the posts from this thread.

If I catch you using multiple accounts to bump your own advertisement threads again in the future I will ban all of your accounts and blacklist your server name.[/quote]
Not that I’m against the banning of all accounts but they find a way around that. There’s a usergroup you can add him to that removes his right to post or view anything in this board. If I remember correctly as default all globals are a part of it, (maybe something fucked up with the global being made true global?) just add him to that. Saves you having to get admin ban permission etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Avatar 317 - VPS Hosted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“AvatarPS, post:9, topic:545110”]Haha well if you put it that way isn’t that what everyone does :p…

Nah but thanks for the feedback and all really appreciate it yeah it was a bit rushed but updating regularly, but yeah thank you both for your feedback.

and btw website is temp until we can afford an IPB forum.[/quote]
People usually give credits, or some do. Not everyone just takes someone else’s work, changes the name, then hosts. Yes, I’ve seen it in the past, but that doesn’t mean you gotta do it because they did.

Also, don’t waste your money on IPB, it isn’t even that good. Go get SMF 2.0.8 (i think that’s the latest) and install one of the newer themes.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @AvatarPS AvatarPS
item.description:

I’m glad you can take someone else’s source and put your name on it.[/quote]

Haha well if you put it that way isn’t that what everyone does :p…

Nah but thanks for the feedback and all really appreciate it yeah it was a bit rushed but updating regularly, but yeah thank you both for your feedback.

and btw website is temp until we can afford an IPB forum.
